Jupyter Notebook Tutorials¶

Below you will find Jupyter Notebook tutorials organized by usage/subject. Each notebook is grouped by one library/sub-library of IRAF tasks, which corresponds to the title of the notebook. Putting together these tutorial notebooks is an ongoing task, feedback and contributions are welcome.

Contents¶

Image Manipulation:

  • images.imfilter
  • images.imgeom
  • images.imutil

Fits Tools:

  • tables.fitsio

Cosmic Ray Rejections:

  • noao.imred.crutil

Index¶

To search IRAF tasks by task name, see the index linked below.
